amendment.description: To expand eligibility for membership in The American Legion and to prohibit discrimination with respect to staff positions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 252 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 252 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tillis. (consideration: CR S3326; text: CR S3326) To expand eligibility for membership in The American Legion and to prohibit discrimination with respect to staff positions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 252 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 252 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tillis.
